mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_POINT ( point_id, acc_point, accident, dead, seriously, ordinary, report, point_type, longitude, latitude, year, gname, acc_frequency ) VALUES ( #{pid}, #{accPoint}, #{accident}, #{dead}, #{seriously}, #{ordinary}, #{report}, #{pointType}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{year}, #{gname}, #{accFrequency} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(gname) as gname FROM D_POINT WHERE YEAR= #{year}
